subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Don Catlin, the well-known anti-doping scientist whom Lance Armstrong hired to create his strict and transparent anti-doping program, is parting ways with Armstrong.
snippet: Don Catlin, the well-known anti-doping scientist whom Lance Armstrong hired to create his strict and transparent anti-doping program, is parting ways with Armstrong.
